original_text:
Make us glad for as many days as you have afflicted us,
    for as many years as we have seen trouble.
korean_text: 우리를 괴롭게 하신 날수대로와 우리가 화를 당한 연수대로 우리를 기쁘게 하소서

sentences.original_text: for as many days as you have afflicted us
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 우리를 괴롭힌 날만큼 많은 날 동안

sentences.original_text: for as many years as we have seen trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 고난을 본 햇수만큼 많은 해 동안
